There
output:
are a couple of bugs, like the fact that the player can get stuck in a wall when climbing up or down. Also, the game is very hard and does not offer any hint. If you get stuck it is best to try again.

Survival of the Tastiest is also available on iOS, but the game is missing a lot of features. You can still play it, but you can’t move the table and you can’t unlock any new dishes.
